species.name: drifloon
descriptions: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.”
If for some reason its body bursts, its soul spills out with a screaming sound.
It is whispered that any child who mistakes DRIFLOON for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
Its round body is stuffed with souls and expands each time it leads someone away.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

abilities.name: unburden
abilities.effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

abilities.name: flare-boost
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.
